name: Wireless HDMI Transmitter and Receiver 4K 30HZ, 1000 FT, HDMI Loop-Out, IR Extend, Dual Cooling Systems, 9 Channels, 1 TX to 3 RXS, Streaming from STB, PC, DVD, CCTV to TV, Projector, Monitor
short_description: Usage and compatibility: The function of transmitter and receiver is to wirelessly transmit the audio and video signals from devices such as DVD players, PCs, STBs, and game consoles to devices like TVs, projectors, and monitors. The transmitter is compatible with all devices that have an HDMI output port, such as DVD players, PCs, Set - Top Boxes (STBs), and game consoles. The receiver is compatible with all devices that have an HDMI input port, like TVs, projectors, and monitors.

Unleash True 4K Power: The Graige 952’s hardware decoding offers 4.4 times the computing power of 1080P devices, delivering superior 4K 30HZ transmission. For 1080P 60HZ streaming, it ensures lower latency, providing a seamless and lag-free experience.

Unmatched 1000 FT Range: Graige 952 Wireless HDMI delivers a remarkable transmission distance of up to 1000FT. Perfect for home theaters, conference rooms, or outdoor setups, it ensures lag-free and uninterrupted video and audio transmission.

Convenient IR Control: Graige 952 Wireless HDMI comes with an IR emitter and receiver. Simply use your existing remote control to control the living room TV Box from your bedroom. Remote Controller Not Included.

Active + Passive Dual Cooling System: Active cooling features an ultra-quiet fan paired with a temperature control algorithm. Passive cooling uses two large nano-sprayed aluminum plates. The dual system ensures efficient, smooth transmission and extends device lifespan.
HDMI Loop-Out for Dual Display: The Graige 952 Wireless HDMI Transmitter includes an additional HDMI output port. Enabling simultaneous viewing the stream of your 1 STB/PC in 2 different rooms.

9 WiFi Bands for Optimal Performance: Graige 952 provides 9 WiFi bands, manually selectable to bypass congested channels. Distinct bands can carry separate signals, enabling up to 4 sets of devices to coexist in the same environment without interference.
1 Transmitter, Up to 3 Receivers: Graige 952 allows one transmitter to connect to up to three receivers, making it an great ideal for large conference rooms, classroom and studios.
Progressive Scan Formats Only: Graige 952 supports progressive scan formats like 2160p, 1080p, and 720p. It does not support interlaced scan formats such as 1080i or 720i.
Package includes: Graige 952 wireless HDMI transmitter and receiver, 2 HDMI cables, infrared transmitter and receiver, 2 power cables, and 2 5V 2A power adapters.

name: 2025 Upgraded Wireless HDMI Transmitter and Receiver, 165FT/50M 4K Decode 1080P Output, Plug & Play Portable 2.4G/5G Wireless HDMI Extender Kit for Desktop,PC,TV Box, PS5/4 to TV/Monitor/Projector.
short_description: [Plug-and-Play, Lightweight and Portable] The wireless HDMI is pre-paired and ready to use upon purchase, requiring no drivers, apps, or network connection. It's lightweight and portable, eliminating the need for bulky wired cables. Perfect for outdoor business presentations, conference rooms, home entertainment, and multimedia education, providing convenience and efficiency.

[Long-Range, No-Lag, and Strong Compatibility] This device has a transmission range of up to 165 feet/50 meters in open areas and up to 100 feet/30 meters indoors. It features a built-in high-performance chip for excellent compatibility. Utilizing dual-band 2.4G/5G transmission protocols, it boasts strong anti-interference capabilities and high signal stability, effectively eliminating issues such as flickering, black screens, and latency. (Note: Transmission range may be reduced in the presence of obstacles like walls, floors, and ceilings. Additionally, the signal may not penetrate enclosed floors or ceilings.)

[4K Decoding, 1080P Full HD] The wireless HDMI transmitter and receiver support 4K decoding and 1080P/60Hz Full HD output, delivering smooth and clear images on the big screen, ensuring consistent visuals and enhancing the viewing experience in settings such as business presentations and home movie nights.

[Dual Mode Flexibility] This device offers two modes - mirroring and extending, allowing you to choose flexibly between them. In mirroring mode, the audio and video content from the source device is replicated on the target screen, providing an identical viewing experience. On the other hand, the extending mode expands your workspace by enabling you to display different content on each screen, thus enhancing your efficiency and multitasking capabilities.

[Please note the direction of use] Connect the TX (Transmitter) to the signal source, and the RX (Receiver) to the display device. This device is widely applicable in business meetings, large conferences, teaching, home theaters, live camera streaming, sports broadcasting, and photography work.

[After-sales Service and Product List] Our products undergo extremely rigorous multiple tests before leaving the factory, and we promise to provide exceptional after-sales support to ensure your satisfaction. If you encounter any issues during use, please contact us promptly. You will receive: HDMI Transmitter x1, HDMI Receiver x1, User Manual x1, Charging Cables x2, Micro HDMI Adapter x1, Mini HDMI Adapter x1.
